genshinspire:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
genshinspire:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

genshinspire:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
genshinspire:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
genshinspire:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

genshinspire:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
genshinspire:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

genshinspire:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
genshinspire:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !genshinspire:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

genshinspire:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
genshinspire:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !genshinspire:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
